body.p:
Paducah Sept. 17. 1861.
His Excellency
Govr. of Ky.
Sir.

Enclosed you have petition in behalf of James Carrol convicted of Larceny in Livingston Circuit Court also letter of the Comth's atto. Mr Lowe ^also of Judge Bunch^ -- The facts stated in the petition are true. Carrol's character was proven by a host of Witnesses to be good beyond question, and I do most sinderely think his pardon would be a proper exercise of Executive clemency --

respectfully
Your obt svt
J. B. Husbands
